channel.title: WoW private servers
channel.description:
Okay just a quick question, are there any WoW servers that run on the original WoW, without burning crusade?
If so, link pls.

Mopman i sent you a pm a few days ago, have you read it?

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

xEnt:

Ascent/Antrix is very very close to the original WoW.

That was never the point of Mangos. The point of Mangos was to be a well coded server which supported all the features people needed in order to develop Wow emulators.

Ascent should be called WowMoparscape.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

Mopman:

Why does mangos fail? The code is much nicer…

… if you have an eye missing and the other one is severely swollen

Read full topic

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Mopman:

Why does mangos fail? The code is much nicer…

Lack of features. Ascent can already hold 5k+ users without lag. So if were talking in terms of better coding for better performance, 5k+ is fine.

I don’t know how far mangos is, last time i tried it… it was the shittest shit ever, like hardly developed, more of “a pk server” kinda feel it had. Ascent/Antrix is very very close to the original WoW.

Read full topic

But at this topic maker, why not just download the 2gb jump to TBC.

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Yes, that website. Looks like they got some nasty ads on their site, I’d imagine they are gone now.

Hi folks, as you might have noticed we have some problems over here. We are listed as an 'attack site' and google is posting a warning if you search for our site. Please have a look at the following site:

Google Safe Browsing diagnostic page for wowstatus.net

The problems on our site are coming from:

wowgoldads.com & xinhai5566.com

We do not install any Badware or attacking ware on our server. We are attacked by these sites.

It happens.

Read full topic

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

this “wowstatus” is this www.wowstatus.net?
My firefox stops me from entering the site, telling me it will try to install virus and shit on my computer.

"What is the current listing status for wowstatus.net/? 
Site is listed as suspicious - visiting this web site may harm your computer.

Part of this site was listed for suspicious activity 6 time(s) over the past 90 days.

What happened when Google visited this site?

Of the 1461 pages we tested on the site over the past 90 days, 2 page(s) resulted in malicious software being downloaded and installed without user consent. The last time Google visited this site was on 08/18/2008, and the last time suspicious content was found on this site was on 08/18/2008.

Malicious software includes 17 exploit(s). Successful infection resulted in an average of 2 new processes on the target machine.

Malicious software is hosted on 2 domain(s), including wowgoldads.com, xinhai5566.com.

Has this site acted as an intermediary resulting in further distribution of malware?

Over the past 90 days, wowstatus.net/ appeared to function as an intermediary for the infection of 1 site(s) including wowstatus.sub.cc.

Has this site hosted malware?

No, this site has not hosted malicious software over the past 90 days.

How did this happen?

In some cases, third parties can add malicious code to legitimate sites, which would cause us to show the warning message.

Next steps:

* Return to the previous page.
* If you are the owner of this web site, you can request a review of your site using Google Webmaster Tools. More information about the review process is available in Google's Webmaster Help Center."</blockquote>

Read full topic

item.title: WoW private servers
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You don’t need old versions of mangos and ascent, they both have config file options to disable BC content.

Wowstatus has a search option to exclude BC servers

Read full topic

And i assume you want to play on a server, not run one.
